issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Description:
Runtime error when trying to launch Controls> "Progress Bar" in KitchenSink.

Steps:
Launch KitchenSink> Controls> Progress Bar.

Expected results:
"Progress Bar" launches successfully.

Actual results:
Runtime Error: "Uncaught TypeError: Object has no method 'set value'" appears.
fields.summary: KitchenSink: Android: Controls -  Runtime error when launching "Progress Bar"
fields.environment:
Tested on:
Titanium Studio, build: 2.1.3.201209061858
Titanium Studio SDK, build: 2.2.0.v20120906230912
Devices:
Nexus Android tablet version 4.1.1
LG Tablet, Android version 3.1
Sprint phone htc, Android version 4.0.3
Samsung Galaxy SIII, version 4.0.4
LG Phone, Android version 2.3

comments.body: This should be fixed on latest master and latest refactored KS.
Closing ticket as the issue cannot be reproduced.
